body.name: Hasuit 6 Drawer Dresser with LED Lights and Charging Station, Wide Chest of 6 Drawers with Open Space, Modern Large Capacity Storage Cabinet, Black Dresser for Bedroom, Living Room, Hallway
features: 【Dresser with RGB LED Lights】LED lights make the drawer dresser look prettier in the dark and add a unique vibe to your bedroom. The LED lights can be controlled by button control or APP. It has more than 60,000 colors to choose from, the brightness can be adjusted, and there are many other modes waiting for you to explore: custom style mode, music mode, mic mode, and timing function.

【Charging Station and USB Port】Drawer Dresser is equipped with 3 standard plug outlets and 2 USB ports, as well as a 6.56-foot-long power cord. Enables you to charge mobile devices such as mobile phones, keyboards, headsets, desk lamps, and other appliances at any time. Easy to use within your arms' reach.

【Storage to Get Rid of Clutter】LED wooden drawer dresser has 6 spacious private storage drawers, which can store your clothes, toys, books, or any other personal items. The top layer open storage shelf and large desktop can be used to display or store your frames, vases, books, or other decorations. Making it easier for you to sort and store clutter! Overall measures 47.3" (W) x 15.8" (D) x 31.5" (H).

【Steady Quality Assurance】Wide 6 drawer chest is constructed of a solid MDF wood, which has a strong load-bearing capacity and is sturdy and durable. Each drawer is fitted with smooth metal slide rails that are easy to pull out. The thick back plate and the anti-fall device ensure the privacy and stability of the drawer dresser.

【Every Corner Needs It】Modern black chest of drawers with LED lights and charging station. It's so elegant and makes your room look bright and shows your taste and can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. Store clothes or blankets in the bedroom, organize books and sundries in the living room, store toys in the kid's room, or use them as a makeup cabinet. This practical and beautiful cabinet is a great gift for family or friends！

【Let Us Know】Assemble is required, but don't worry! Hasuit drawer dresser has clear Installation steps, and all parts are individually packed and marked. If you have any problems with assembly and quality, please contact our store's support team first and we’ll give you a solution. Thank you for your support and trust！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hasuit 6 Drawer Dresser with LED Lights and Charging Station！ Wide black dresser is constructed of sturdy MDF wood, which has a strong load-bearing capacity and is durable. Smart 6 drawers dresser with multi-color ambient led light can be combined with your wall-mounted TV as an entertainment center for your DVDs, record players, and other devices.

Chest of 6 Drawers with open shelves is equipped with 3 standard plug outlets and 2 USB ports, as well as a 6.56-foot-long power cord. Enables you to charge mobile devices such as mobile phones, keyboards, headsets, desk lamps, and other appliances at any time. Easy to use within your arms' reach.

LED lights looks prettier in the dark and adds a unique vibe to your bedroom You can freely set the brightness,color,mode and timing function,and design your light show to your heart's content. with RGB LED Lights Beds Makes Your Life Smarter，more suitable for your needs.

LED lights make the drawer dresser looks prettier in the dark！ Adds a unique vibe to your bedroom. The LED lights can be controlled by button control or APP. It has more than 60,000 colors to choose from, the brightness can be adjusted, and there are many other modes waiting for you to explore: custom style mode, music mode, mic mode, and timing function.

6 Drawers and 2 Open Space：Large Storage to Get Rid of Clutter！ Wooden dresser has 6 spacious private storage drawers, which can store your clothes, toys, or any other personal items. Top layer open space & wide desktop can be used to display your frames, vases, or others. Each drawer is fitted with smooth metal slide rails and handles that are easy to pull out.

This practical and beautiful cabinet is a great gift for family or friends！ Large dresser for your bedroom, organize sundries in the living room or porch, store toys in the kid room, or use it as a makeup cabinet. More: hygiene products、underwear、sheets and quilt covers, etc. The thick back plate & anti-fall device ensure the privacy and stability of the drawer dresser.
Use on its own or pair it with other matching pieces from the Hasuit Collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome and holds alot
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and really nice quality. Perfect for any teenage room. It holds a lot of clothing. Sturdy peice of furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy , very cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: Looks good but very cheap furniture. Can’t put much clothes in either

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Storage and Look
reviews.reviewText: I like this whole unit. The height, look and mostly because was as advertised and the price was much better than other Retailers. Drawer space is awesome and the outlet could have been placed in a better location like on the side like the tall dresser and could utilize the whole top shelf. Was very easy to put together I read the instructions first and made sure everything was accounted for before starting. Took about 2 hours and that’s because I stopped several times to help family members and using an electric drill on slow comes in very handy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is very heavy when delivered. The dresser comes in a lot of little pieces. With time and patience it became a nice dresser. Took a few hours to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Two Stars is being nice
reviews.reviewText: Don’t buy just because it’s pretty. I love the color of this dresser as it matches my bedframe perfectly. Sad news is it took me all day to build (even with help) and in the end the top two drawers don’t close all the way and the entire front of the bottom left drawer keeps falling off and has to be reputogether at least once a week. The cam lock nuts keep falling out of the engraved hole because it was made too large by the manufacturer. I am very upset and just genuinely wish this was a sturdier better quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my newborn clothes and i love it . Easy to assemble and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Dresser came in on time. Had all the tools and materials to put this together. Lights are a plus. My son is fascinated by them lol. No defects on the dresser I received. Works as advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of the cubby shelves had severely misaligned connector peg holes in its side and I had to drill new ones.Two points off for that. The drawer doors themselves also are all slightly misaligned with each other so I had to swap some of the drawers around while assembling so that they wouldn't collide with each other and could be closed. Some of the first few pieces needed during assembly are shipped at the very bottom of the box. The included LED strip also uses an app (Lotus Lantern) that isn't compatible with Google Home.Still, now that it's together it feels decently sturdy and does its job.
